statements: SELECT * FROM Electronic_Recycling
SELECT item_name, weight, materials_recovered FROM Electronic_Recycling
SELECT item_name, recycling_facility FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE weight > 5.0
SELECT * FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE recycling_facility = 'Recycle Center A'
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered, weight FROM Electronic_Recycling ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE item_name = 'Laptop' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE weight > 5.0;
SELECT item_name, weight, recycling_facility FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE materials_recovered LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT * FROM Electronic_Recycling WHERE recycling_facility = 'Tech Recyclers' AND weight BETWEEN 2.0 AND 10.0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM Electronic_Recycling;
SELECT * FROM electronic_items;
SELECT item_name, weight, recycling_facility FROM electronic_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, material_recovered FROM electronic_items WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT facility_name, location, contact_person FROM recycling_facilities;
SELECT * FROM electronic_items WHERE material_recovered = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM electronic_items WHERE weight > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, material_recovered FROM electronic_items WHERE recycling_facility = 'Recycle Hub';
SELECT item_name, weight, recycling_facility FROM electronic_items WHERE material_recovered = 'Plastic' AND weight < 20 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, contact_person FROM recycling_facilities WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM electronic_items e JOIN recycling_facilities r ON e.recycling_facility = r.facility_name;
SELECT * FROM ElectronicItems;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM ElectronicItems ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities WHERE location='New York';
SELECT item_id, facility_id FROM RecyclingRecords WHERE recycling_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM ElectronicItems WHERE materials_recovered IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM ElectronicItems WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingRecords WHERE record_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM ElectronicItems WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT item_name, location FROM ElectronicItems JOIN RecyclingRecords ON ElectronicItems.item_id = RecyclingRecords.item_id WHERE RecyclingRecords.facility_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingItems;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM RecyclingItems WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM RecyclingItems WHERE materials_recovered IS NOT NULL;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities;
SELECT process_date, facility_id FROM RecyclingProcesses ORDER BY process_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingItems ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, recycling_facility, weight FROM RecyclingItems WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT item_name, recycling_facility, process_date FROM RecyclingItems JOIN RecyclingProcesses ON RecyclingItems.item_id = RecyclingProcesses.item_id;

SELECT RecyclingFacilities.facility_name, RecyclingProcesses.process_date, MaterialTypes.material_name FROM RecyclingFacilities JOIN RecyclingProcesses ON RecyclingFacilities.facility_id = RecyclingProcesses.facility_id JOIN MaterialTypes ON RecyclingItems.item_id = MaterialTypes.material_id;
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM RecyclingItems WHERE materials_recovered IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ElectronicItems;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM ElectronicItems WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT item_name, materials_recovered FROM ElectronicItems WHERE materials_recovered LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT process_date, weight_recycled FROM RecyclingProcesses WHERE facility_id = 3 ORDER By process_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM ElectronicItems WHERE weight > 10
SELECT material_name, recycling_method FROM RecycledMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProcesses ORDER BY process_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, location FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM RecyclingFacilities WHERE capacity >= 10000
